function dfs(current, last3) result(res)

    integer, intent(in) :: current

    character(len=3), intent(in) :: last3

    integer :: res

    integer :: idx, i, c_val, new_idx

    if (current == N) then

        res = 1

        return

    end if

    idx = get_index(last3)

    if (memo(current, idx) /= -1) then

        res = memo(current, idx)

        return

    end if

    res = 0

    do i = 1, 4

        c = tokens(i)

        new_last4 = last3 // c

        if (is_ok(new_last4)) then

            new_last3 = last3(2:3) // c

            new_idx = get_index(new_last3)

            res = res + dfs(current+1, new_last3)

            res = mod(res, MOD)

        end if

    end do

    memo(current, idx) = res

    return

end function

            is_ok = .false.

            return

        end if

        do i =1,3

            temp = s

            temp(i:i+1) = temp(i+1:i:-1)  ! swap characters at positions i and i+1

            if (index(temp, 'AGC') /=0) then

                is_ok = .false.

                return

            end if

        end do

        is_ok = .true.

    end function

    recursive function dfs(current, last3) result(res)

        integer, intent(in) :: current

        character(len=3), intent(in) :: last3

        integer :: res

        integer :: idx, new_idx, i, c_val

        character(len=3) :: new_last3

        if (current == N_third) then

            res =1

            return

        end if

        idx = get_index(last3)

        if (memo(current, idx) /= -1) then

            res = memo(current, idx)

            return

        end if

        res =0

        do i =1,4

            character(len=1) :: c = tokens(i)

            character(len=4) :: new_last4 = last3 // c

            if (is_ok(new_last4)) then

                new_last3 = last3(2:3) // c

                res = res + dfs(current+1, new_last3)

                res = mod(res, MOD)

            end if

        end do

        memo(current, idx) = res

        return

    end function

    ! Now, the main code

    ! Process first program

    read(*,*) n

    beacon = 0

    do i = 1, n

        beacon(a) = val

    ! Initialize dp(0)

    if (beacon(0) /=0) then

    max_val = dp(0)

    do i =1, max_a

            if (beacon(i) <i) then

                dp(i) = dp(i - beacon(i) -1) +1

            else

                dp(i) =1

            end if

        else

            dp(i) = dp(i-1)

        end if

        if (dp(i) > max_val) then

            max_val = dp(i)

        end if

    end do

    first_result = n - max_val

    ! Process second program

    x = first_result

    if (mod(x,2) ==0 .and. x /=2) then

        x = x +1

    end if

    do

        sqrt_num = nint(sqrt(real(x)))

        found = .false.

        do i =3, sqrt_num, 2

            if (mod(x,i) ==0) then

                found = .true.

                exit

            end if

        end do

        if (.not. found) then

            exit

        else

            x = x +2

        end if

    end do

    second_result = x

    ! Process third program

    N_third = second_result

    ! Allocate memo array

    integer, allocatable :: memo(:,:)

    allocate(memo(0:N_third, 0:63))

    memo = -1

    third_result = dfs(0, 'TTT')

    deallocate(memo)

    ! Output the result

    print*, third_result

end program main
